name: War Games Pack
overview: A single cassette compilation comprising the games Battlezone 2000, Empire, Johnny Reb, Paras, Roman Empire and The Stolen Lamp. All were previously published as stand-alone titles. Empire is by Shards, the other 5 are by Lothlorien. The Stolen Lamp is a text adventure with graphics, the other 5 are strategy games. Johnny Reb is for 1 or 2 players, the other 5 are single player only.
